proposal: Hey Chainlink community, I see you've been busy pioneering the world of cryptographic guarantees with a whopping transaction value of $8,847,755,828,033. That's impressive! With 2472 holders on BSC network, it seems like you guys are the real deal. To further support your growth, we offer tools to create your own DEX, lottery, wallet, and more. All B2B, so you're not just playing, you're creating. See my profile for demo and details.
